---
labels: ['beer', 'entity']
description: 'A Beer entity.'
---

A component for a user entity, supports serialization and deseralization of user objects and can be used from
both backend and frontend.

## Deserializing from a plain user object 

Use the `.from` method to deserialize a plain user object to a `User` entity.

```ts
const user = Beer.from({
  name: 'ranm8',
});
console.log(user);
// echos { name: 'ranm8' }
```

## Serializing to a plain object

Use the `user.toObject()` method to serailize a `User` object to a plain object.

```ts
import { User } from '@bitdev/node.examples.user';

const user = User.from({
  name: 'ranm8'
});

const plainObject = user.toObject();
console.log(plainObject);
// echos {name: 'ranm8'}
```
